verses.verse: Whoever<WG3956> <WG3588> believes<WG4100> that Jesus<WG2424> is the Christ<WG5547> is born<WG1080> of God:<WG2316> and every<WG3956> one that loves<WG25> him that begat<WG1080> loves<WG25> him also<WG2532> that is begotten<WG1080> of him.
By this<WG5129> we know<WG1097> that we love<WG25> the children<WG5043> of God,<WG2316> when<WG3752> we love<WG25> God,<WG2316> and keep<WG5083> his commandments.<WG1785>
For this<WG3778> is the love<WG26> of God,<WG2316> that we keep<WG5083> his commandments:<WG1785> and his commandments<WG1785> are not grievous.<WG926>
For whatever<WG3956> is born<WG1080> of God<WG2316> overcomes<WG3528> the world:<WG2889> and this<WG3778> is the victory<WG3529> that overcomes<WG3528> the world,<WG2889> even our faith.<WG4102>
Who<WG5101> is he that overcomes<WG3528> the world,<WG2889> but he that believes<WG4100> that Jesus<WG2424> is the Son<WG5207> of God?<WG2316>

This<WG3778> is he that came<WG2064> by water<WG5204> and blood,<WG129> even Jesus<WG2424> Christ;<WG5547> not by water<WG5204> only,<WG3440> but by water<WG5204> and blood.<WG129> And it is the Spirit<WG4151> that bears<WG3140> witness,<WG3140> because<WG3754> the Spirit<WG4151> is truth.<WG225>

For there are three<WG5140> that bear<WG3140> record<WG3140> in heaven,<WG3772> the Father,<WG3962> the Word,<WG3056> and the Holy<WG40> Ghost:<WG4151> and these<WG3778> three<WG5140> are one.<WG1520>

And there are three<WG5140> that bear<WG3140> witness<WG3140> in earth,<WG1093> the Spirit,<WG4151> and the water,<WG5204> and the blood:<WG129> and these<WG3778> three<WG5140> agree<WG1526> in one.<WG1520>

If<WG1487> we receive<WG2983> the witness<WG3141> of men,<WG444> the witness<WG3141> of God<WG2316> is greater:<WG3187> for this<WG3778> is the witness<WG3141> of God<WG2316> which<WG3739> he has testified<WG3140> of his Son.<WG5207>

He that believes<WG4100> on<WG1519> the Son<WG5207> of God<WG2316> has<WG2192> the witness<WG3141> in himself:<WG1438> he that believes<WG4100> not God<WG2316> has made<WG4160> him a liar;<WG5583> because<WG3754> he believes<WG4100> not the record<WG3141> that God<WG2316> gave<WG3140> of his Son.<WG5207>
And this<WG3778> is the record,<WG3141> that God<WG2316> has given<WG1325> to us eternal<WG166> life,<WG2222> and this<WG3778> life<WG2222> is in his Son.<WG5207>
He that has<WG2192> the Son<WG5207> has<WG2192> life;<WG2222> and he that has<WG2192> not the Son<WG5207> of God<WG2316> has<WG2192> not life.<WG2222>

These<WG5023> things have I written<WG1125> to you that believe<WG4100> on<WG1519> the name<WG3686> of the Son<WG5207> of God;<WG2316> that you may know<WG1492> that you have<WG2192> eternal<WG166> life,<WG2222> and that you may believe<WG4100> on<WG1519> the name<WG3686> of the Son<WG5207> of God.<WG2316>
And this<WG3778> is the confidence<WG3954> that we have<WG2192> in him, that, if<WG1437> we ask<WG154> any<WG5100> thing according<WG2596> to his will,<WG2307> he hears<WG191> us:
And if<WG1437> we know<WG1492> that he hear<WG191> us, whatever<WG3739> <WG302> we ask,<WG154> we know<WG1492> that we have<WG2192> the petitions<WG155> that we desired<WG154> of him.

If<WG1437> any<WG5100> man see<WG1492> his brother<WG80> sin<WG264> a sin<WG266> which is not to death,<WG2288> he shall ask,<WG154> and he shall give<WG1325> him life<WG2222> for them that sin<WG264> not to death.<WG2288> There is a sin<WG266> to death:<WG2288> I do not say<WG3004> that he shall pray<WG2065> for it.
All<WG3956> unrighteousness<WG93> is sin:<WG266> and there is a sin<WG266> not to death.<WG2288>

We know<WG1492> that whoever<WG3956> <WG3588> is born<WG1080> of God<WG2316> sins<WG264> not; but he that is begotten<WG1080> of God<WG2316> keeps<WG5083> himself,<WG1438> and that wicked<WG4190> one touches<WG680> him not.
And we know<WG1492> that we are of God,<WG2316> and the whole<WG3650> world<WG2889> lies<WG2749> in wickedness.<WG4190>

And we know<WG1492> that the Son<WG5207> of God<WG2316> is come,<WG2240> and has given<WG1325> us an understanding,<WG1271> that we may know<WG1097> him that is true,<WG228> and we are in him that is true,<WG228> even in his Son<WG5207> Jesus<WG2424> Christ.<WG5547> This<WG3778> is the true<WG228> God,<WG2316> and eternal<WG166> life.<WG2222>
Little<WG5040> children,<WG5040> keep<WG5442> yourselves<WG1438> from idols.<WG1497> Amen.<WG281>
